details.description: When are your tax credit payments due and how bank holidays affect your payments
details.body:
Your payments are made every week or every 4 weeks - theyâ€™re paid early if the payment date is a bank holiday.

You choose how often you want to be paid on your claim form.

Your award notice tells you the date of your first payment. You can use this or your bank statements to work out when your next payment is due.

Bank holidays

Your payment is paid early if it’s due on any UK bank holiday.

Bank holiday Payment date
6 Aug 2012 (Scotland only) 3 Aug 2012
27 Aug 2012 (summer bank holiday) 24 Aug 2012
30 Nov 2012 (St Andrew’s Day - Scotland) 29 Nov 2012
25 Dec 2012 (Christmas Day) 24 Dec 2012
26 Dec 2012 (Boxing Day) 24 Dec 2012
27 Dec 2012 (Northern Ireland) 24 Dec 2012

Check your bank account and then call the Tax Credit Office if your payment is late.
